publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2987 Gil Paterson on behalf of the Standards, Procedures and Public Appointments Committee: Elections to the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body—That the Parliament notes the Standards, Procedures and Public Appointments Committee’s 1st Report, 2008 (Session 3), Elections to the Scottish Parliamentary Corporate Body (SP Paper 47), and agrees that the changes to Standing Orders set out in Annexe A to the report be made with effect from 11 December 2008. Supported by: Marilyn Livingstone*
